text: E re: “Ke mang ea le hanetseng ka liaparo tsa Allah tseo a li hlahiselitseng makhabunyane a Hae, e bile e le lintho tse lokileng tsa lihlahisoa tsa Hae?” U boele u re: “Lintho tseo, mohla Letsatsi la tsoho, e tla ba tsa ba ileng ba lumela nakong ea bophelo ba Lefats’e lena feela. Ke kamoo re etsang tatellano ea lits’enolo tsa rona kateng sebakeng sa batho banang le tsebo”
